solution_line_template: Luke sleeps {luke_longer_than_connor} hours longer than Connor who sleeps {connor_sleep_hours} hours so that’s {luke_longer_than_connor}+{connor_sleep_hours} = <<{luke_longer_than_connor}+{connor_sleep_hours}={luke_sleep_hours}>>{luke_sleep_hours} hours

The new puppy sleeps twice as long as Luke, who sleeps {luke_sleep_hours} hours, so the puppy sleeps {puppy_sleep_multiplier}*{luke_sleep_hours} = <<{puppy_sleep_multiplier}*{luke_sleep_hours}={puppy_sleep_hours}>>{puppy_sleep_hours} hours
